title: Kevin Tong Watch Face
summary: Animate your watch face with robots illustrated by Kevin Tong.
description: "Animated robots — need we say more? Actually, we could, but we wouldn’t want to spoil the surprise.American illustrator Kevin Tong has teamed up with digital production company MediaMonks to bring his mechanical creations to life.The illustrations display the time in digits and change with the time of day."
descriptionHTML:
"Animated robots — need we say more? Actually, we could, but we wouldn’t want to spoil the surprise.

American illustrator Kevin Tong has teamed up with digital production company MediaMonks to bring his mechanical creations to life.

The illustrations display the time in digits and change with the time of day."
comments: Super Cute... Needs Complications Without a date display or any other info, this is only good for a night out after work or on weekends. It is super cute though.
Beautiful Battery killer The animations and the design is amazing. But, consumes a lot of battery.
Cool but needs complications like date, day and battery level
Great design Great design and fun watch faces that change throughout the day.
I love these animations! My favorite watch face!
